tools.name: read-query
tools.description: Execute a SELECT query on the SQLite database

tools.name: write-query
tools.description: Execute an INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE query on the SQLite database

tools.name: create-table
tools.description: Create a new table in the SQLite database

tools.name: list-tables
tools.description: List all tables in the SQLite database

tools.name: describe-table
tools.description: Get the schema information for a specific table

table_name.description: Name of the table to describe

tools.name: append-insight
tools.description: Add a business insight to the memo

insight.description: Business insight discovered from data analysis
